lines.text: Bob, do you hear... someone talking?
[left alone in the shadows, Joan hears her alter ego's voice]
Joan... Joan... I've been fighting with you all your life... Listen, you, I've waited a long time for this. You've gotta let me live!... I won't go back in the dark. I'll live! I'll live!
Did you think you could run away? Why don't you let me take over now?
[When Joan's fiancee comes to take her home, Joan's evil alter ego has other idea's]
The scissors. Pick them up. Kill him! Lift your arm. Higher... higher... higher. Now - strike!
Once in many, many millions of births, a body can have two divergent personalities living in the same brain.
